trans-unit.source: Represents a security token that is based upon an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Representa um token de segurança baseado em um certificado X.509.

trans-unit.source: To get the details of the X.509 certificate, access the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter os detalhes do certificado x. 509, acessar o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> that contains the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> que contém o certificado X.509.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" /> class using the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" />, usando o certificado X.509 especificado.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a unique identifier for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security token and assigns that value to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Id%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor cria um identificador exclusivo para o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> token de segurança e atribui o valor para o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Id%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> that contains the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> que contém o certificado X.509.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate" />.

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier of the security token.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador exclusivo do token de segurança.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Id" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Id" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" /> class using the specified X.509 certificate and unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" /> usando o algoritmo X.509 e o identificador exclusivo especificados.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="id" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="id" /> é nulo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> that specifies the key identifier to create.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> que especifica o identificador de chave para criar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this security token is capable of creating the specified key identifier.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esse token de segurança é capaz de criar o identificador de chave especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when <paramref name="T" /> is of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause" />, or <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> quando <paramref name="T" /> for do tipo <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause" /> ou <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause" />, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for an X.509 certificate can be expressed using many different key identifier clauses.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de chave para um certificado x. 509 pode ser expressado usando várias cláusulas de identificador de chave diferente.

trans-unit.source: These key identifier clauses are represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause> classes.
trans-unit.target: Essas cláusulas de identificador de chave são representadas pelo <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause>, e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause> classes.

trans-unit.source: Gets the X.509 certificate associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o certificado X.509 associado ao token de segurança.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> that contains the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> que contém o certificado X.509.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> property to get the details about the X.509 certificate associated with the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security token.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> propriedade para obter os detalhes sobre o certificado x. 509 associada a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> token de segurança.

trans-unit.source: For instance, the thumbprint of the X.509 certificate can be accessed using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Thumbprint%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a impressão digital do certificado x. 509 pode ser acessada usando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Thumbprint%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> that specifies the key identifier to create.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> que especifica o identificador de chave para criar.

trans-unit.source: Creates the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: Cria a cláusula de identificador de chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> that is a key identifier clause for the security token.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> que é uma cláusula de identificador de chave para o token de segurança.

trans-unit.source: The return value for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.CreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method is one of the key identifier clause types that an X.509 certificate key identifier can be expressed in.
trans-unit.target: O valor de retorno para o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.CreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A> método é um dos tipos de cláusula de identificador de chave que um identificador de chave do certificado x. 509 pode ser expressa em.

trans-unit.source: The possible return types are represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause> classes.
trans-unit.target: Os possíveis tipos de retorno são representados pelo <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause>, e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause> classes.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" />.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> method when you are finished using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> método quando tiver terminado de usar o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> método deixa o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> em um estado inutilizável.

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> method, you must release all references to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> método, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> para o coletor de lixo possa recuperar a memória que o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> estava ocupando.

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre chamar <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> antes de liberar sua última referência para o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não serão liberados até que o coletor de lixo chame o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> do objeto `Finalize` método.

trans-unit.source: Gets a unique identifier of the security token.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um identificador exclusivo do token de segurança.

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier of the security token.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador exclusivo do token de segurança.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the key identifier for this instance is equal to the specified key identifier.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o identificador de chave desta instância é igual ao identificador de chave especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="skiClause" /> is one of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause" />, or <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause" /> types and the key identifier clauses match; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="skiClause" /> for um dos tipos <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause" /> ou <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause" /> e se as cláusulas de identificador de chave corresponderem, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.MatchesKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method matches criteria in the X.509 certificate in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> property based on the type of the `keyIdentifierClause` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.MatchesKeyIdentifierClause%2A> método corresponde aos critérios no certificado x. 509 no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> propriedade com base no tipo do `keyIdentifierClause` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The following table details what is matched.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir fornece detalhes sobre o que for correspondido.

trans-unit.source: Key identifier clause type
trans-unit.target: Tipo de cláusula de identificador de chave

trans-unit.source: What is matched
trans-unit.target: O que é correspondido

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.IssuerName%2A> property and the issuer serial number returned from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetSerialNumber%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.IssuerName%2A> propriedade e o número de série do emissor retornado do <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetSerialNumber%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The data returned from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetRawCertData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Os dados retornados do <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetRawCertData%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The subject key identifier extension in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Extensions%2A> property is matched.
trans-unit.target: A extensão do identificador de chave de assunto no <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Extensions%2A> corresponde à propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The thumbprint that is returned by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetCertHash%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A impressão digital que é retornada pelo <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetCertHash%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cryptographic keys associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as chaves criptográficas associadas ao token de segurança.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" /> that contains the set of keys associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> do tipo <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" /> que contém o conjunto de chaves associadas com o token de segurança.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.SecurityKeys%2A> property to set the cryptographic keys for this security token to protect a SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.SecurityKeys%2A> propriedade para definir as chaves de criptografia para este token de segurança proteger uma mensagem SOAP.

trans-unit.source: The keys can be used, among other things, to digitally sign or encrypt SOAP messages.
trans-unit.target: As chaves podem ser usadas, entre outras coisas, para assinar digitalmente ou criptografar mensagens SOAP.

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception if the <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ThrowIfDisposed" /> method has been called for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Gerará uma exceção se o método <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ThrowIfDisposed" /> tiver sido chamado para essa instância.

trans-unit.source: the <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ThrowIfDisposed" /> method has been called for this instance.
trans-unit.target: o método <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ThrowIfDisposed" /> foi chamado para essa instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets the first instant in time at which this security token is valid.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o primeiro momento em que esse token de segurança é válido.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the instant in time at which this security token is first valid.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> que representa o momento em que esse token de segurança ficou válido pela primeira vez.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> property is specified in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and is the value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.NotBefore%2A> property of the X.509 certificate specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> propriedade é especificada em tempo Universal Coordenado (UTC) e o valor da <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.NotBefore%2A> propriedade do certificado x. 509 especificada no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o último no momento em que esse token de segurança é válido.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> que representa o último no momento em que esse token de segurança é válido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> property is specified in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and is the value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.NotAfter%2A> property of the X.509 certificate specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> propriedade é especificada em tempo Universal Coordenado (UTC) e o valor da <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.NotAfter%2A> propriedade do certificado x. 509 especificada no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> propriedade.
